resources.string: Spo2 Monitor Service - Disable as your like

Please make sure Galaxy Wearable
is running in the background.
And it shows the watch power percentage on the main menu.
The watch side is only to be installed. No need to open it.
It would be best if you turned on Always On.

If you need to test for a short time:
Please adjust the Screen Turn Off to 15 seconds and
Adjust Show Last App to 20 seconds.

If the phone needs to play music
It is better to turn off Media Controls.
